A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was ok\, too much of a comedy\, not enough reverence to the mystery and mysticism of Star Wars. It felt jumbled\, action filled\, but not a lot of plot development. \n\nHate to say it...wish Lucas did these\, but as a producer. JJverse failed Star Trek\, now its failing Star Wars. He might be the biggest destroyer since Micheal Bay.
